data.text: @ladyhorrors Warm water gargle, Mum would say. Take care.
@ladyhorrors I had both: the former - a week ago, the latter - now. Test if you can. Or take some time off.
@nzjazzhistory Ah I have that all the time, but it's called anxiety 😁 https://t.co/5QlYBX2gh9
@ladyhorrors Yeah I’ve already started with the slightly tight chest feeling...
@nzjazzhistory Yeah the autumn asthma will be kicking in soon
@ladyhorrors And the second is why I’m glad UOA went online this semester! One less possible Schrodinger’s Covid (I still have seasonal allergies to play that game with...)
@ladyhorrors (It was the yelling. But also, I was so tired the thought of 10 days of home isolation was quite appealing.)
@suburban_ennui Yes! I had to use my outdoor voice for a bit yesterday in the break in a 2 hour lecture, lots of bellowing to the back of the room
